name: Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc.
summary: Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc., doing business as Marsh McLennan, is a global professional services firm headquartered in New York City. The company operates in insurance brokerage, risk management, reinsurance, talent management, investment advisory, and management consulting through its major subsidiaries including Marsh, Guy Carpenter, Mercer, and Oliver Wyman. With approximately 90,000 employees worldwide, Marsh McLennan is a leader in risk and insurance services and consulting for clients across the globe.
